author: Linda Cooke
description: Rye and ginger liqueur provide the spice, bourbon adds a mellow backbone, while amaretto caresses the palate.
name: Toasted Ginger Godfather
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)
